home-route.header.stats: More than 3000 games played every month!
home-route.header.subtitle:
No prep.
No accounts
Just play your game.
home-route.header.title:
Stop setting things up.
Get right to the game.
home-route.meta.description: Fari is the best way to play tabletop role-playing games online. Play scenes in real-time with your friends, roll dice and let your collective imagination run wild and weave memorable stories together!
home-route.meta.title: The Free and Open-Source Virtual Tabletop
home-route.play-offline.description: Cast your screen to your friends and trust Fari to manage the rest.
home-route.play-offline.title: Offline Game
home-route.play-online.description: Send a link to your friends and start playing right now!
home-route.play-online.title: Online Game
home-route.sections.getting-started.sub-: Playing TTRPG online should not be complicated. Get started now.
home-route.sections.join-community.sub-t: Have a say in the future of the app.
home-route.sections.join-community.title: Join the Community
home-route.sections.open-source.descript:
It's not just about being free, it also means anyone can contribute new features, localize the app and help squash bugs. 

Fari is proudly licensed under AGPLv3.
home-route.sections.open-source.title: 100% Open Source
home-route.sections.patreon.title: Special thanks to those fine folks
home-route.sections.tools.title: Essential Tools
home-route.support-fari.description:
Fari is open-source and completely free. I believe in building great software and applications which benefits the community. However, it also brings challenges when it comes to sustaining the developers behind the project. 

 Maintaining and developing new features in Fari takes a considerable amount of time. But with your financial help, I could spend more time on Fari to make it better or use the financing to upgrade the servers. 

 Any donation helps, but if your financial situation prevents you from helping the project financially, you can always help by spreading the word!
home-route.support-fari.title: Consider Supporting Fari

play-route.error.description1: We could not connect you to the server in order to initialize the game
play-route.error.description2: Try refreshing the page to see if that fixes the issue. You can start an offline game instead.
play-route.error.title: Something wrong happened.
play-route.error.webRTC: The browser you are currently using is not supported by Fari to use its online functionalities. Please choose a different browser like Google Chrome or Firefox.
play-route.host-leaving-warning:
You are the host of this game. If you leave, everyone will be disconnected. 

Do you want to terminate the session ❓
play-route.join-error: There was an error trying to join the game. Please try joining again.
play-route.no-aspects: The scene doesn't have any aspects yet.
play-route.paused-dialog.content: Hey, someone pressed the Paused button. Take a second to talk things through and rewind the game if necessary to make sure everyone is on the same page. Once everyone is ready, the GM can unpause and the game can continue.
play-route.paused-dialog.title: Wait a minute!
